subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Ruslan Chagaev of Uzbekistan wore down Matt Skelton over 12 rounds Saturday night, winning a unanimous decision in Düsseldorf, Germany, to retain his World Boxing Association heavyweight championship. Chagaev (24-0, with 17 knockouts) took control from the fourth round with a strong left hand against Skelton (21-2), the British Commonwealth champion.
